<br>
<strong>1、Raphael AI</strong><br>
<img id="aimg_T2q93" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
https://raphael.app/zh<br>
一个免费无限制的 AI 图像生成器。100% 免费，无需登录，打开即用。采用了 FLUX.1-Dev 模型生成图像，生成质量很不错，各种类型的图像都不在话下。<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_MnGlL" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif"><br>
<br>
<font color="#000000"><font style="font-size:16px"><img id="aimg_QxpFH" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" height="579" file="https://imgheybox.max-c.com/web/bbs/2025/02/04/de2d852d43eb42923700d92437f28fb6/thumb.png?imageMogr2/format/webp/quality/75/auto-orient/ignore-error/1" border="0" alt="" src="https://imgheybox.max-c.com/web/bbs/2025/02/04/de2d852d43eb42923700d92437f28fb6/thumb.png?imageMogr2/format/webp/quality/75/auto-orient/ignore-error/1"></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_gfmP7" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif"><br>
<br>
<strong>2、以词搜番 - Dialogue</strong><br>
<img id="aimg_Ke2P2" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
https://dialogue.moe<br>
一个简洁强大的搜索工具，可以通过台词搜索对应动画番剧，实现“以词搜番”！收录了 7700+ 部带字幕的动漫和 6500万+ 对话。在搜索框中输入台词，就能搜出含有这句台词的动漫剧集，而且能精确到第几集、第几分钟，非常强大。用来找动漫或者剪辑时找素材非常给力。<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_F9P90" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif"><br>
<br>
<font color="#000000"><font style="font-size:16px"><img id="aimg_vZmju" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" height="566" file="https://imgheybox.max-c.com/web/bbs/2025/02/04/5e6ab55c5a3b32a53c4ce9adfa48cb6e/thumb.png?imageMogr2/format/webp/quality/75/auto-orient/ignore-error/1" border="0" alt="" src="https://imgheybox.max-c.com/web/bbs/2025/02/04/5e6ab55c5a3b32a53c4ce9adfa48cb6e/thumb.png?imageMogr2/format/webp/quality/75/auto-orient/ignore-error/1"></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_gb58i" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif"><br>
<br>
<br>
3、在线玩模拟器游戏 | Emu666<br>
<img id="aimg_kXoq8" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
https://www.emu666.com<br>
一个有 500+ 经典游戏的在线模拟器网站。左侧可以筛选游戏类型和语言，很多都是童年经典。无需下载和安装，打开网页就能在线运行各种经典游戏。<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_uUbrr" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif"><br>
<br>
<font color="#000000"><font style="font-size:16px"><img id="aimg_lhhSO" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" height="410" file="https://imgheybox.max-c.com/web/bbs/2025/02/04/a8f840767b7a28d778796f16d880d94f/thumb.png?imageMogr2/format/webp/quality/75/auto-orient/ignore-error/1" border="0" alt="" src="https://imgheybox.max-c.com/web/bbs/2025/02/04/a8f840767b7a28d778796f16d880d94f/thumb.png?imageMogr2/format/webp/quality/75/auto-orient/ignore-error/1"></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_e1h75" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif"><br>
<br>
<strong>4、Run Super Resulotion in Your Browser</strong><br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_FVP5x" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
<br>
https://cappuccino.moe<br>
免费的在线超分辨率图片无损放大工具。我们只要上传图片，选择放大倍数就能一键将模糊图片变清晰。支持将图片放大2~4倍，可以选择放大模型、去噪等，一般默认效果就可以。第一次使用会下载模型需要稍等一会儿。<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_mEER2" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/4.gif"><br>
